XAOToken","name":"","type":"address"}],"stateMutability":"view","type":"function"}],"devdoc":{"author":"XAO Protocol Team","details":"Implements role-based access control and proposal management with domain-specific voting","events":{"RoleAdminChanged(bytes32,bytes32,bytes32)":{"details":"Emitted when `newAdminRole` is set as ``role``'s admin role, replacing `previousAdminRole` `DEFAULT_ADMIN_ROLE` is the starting admin for all roles, despite {RoleAdminChanged} not being emitted signaling this. _Available since v3.1._"},"RoleGranted(bytes32,address,address)":{"details":"Emitted when `account` is granted `role`. `sender` is the account that originated the contract call, an admin role bearer except when using {AccessControl-_setupRole}."},"RoleRevoked(bytes32,address,address)":{"details":"Emitted when `account` is revoked `role`. `sender` is the account that originated the contract call:   - if using `revokeRole`, it is the admin role bearer   - if using `renounceRole`, it is the role bearer (i.e. `account`)"}},"kind":"dev","methods":{"castVote(uint256,bool)":{"details":"Takes into account user's voting power and domain expertise","params":{"proposalId":"ID of the proposal","support":"Whether the vote is in favor or against"}},"constructor":{"details":"Sets up initial roles and connects to XAO token and staking contracts","params":{"_xaoStaking":"Address of the XAO staking contract","_xaoToken":"Address of the XAO token contract"}},"createProposal(string,uint8)":{"details":"Requires proposer to have sufficient stake and appropriate role","params":{"description":"Description of the proposal","domain":"Domain category of the proposal"},"returns":{"_0":"ID of the created proposal"}},"executeProposal(uint256)":{"details":"Can only be called by executor role after voting period ends","params":{"proposalId":"ID of the proposal to execute"}},"getProposal(uint256)":{"params":{"proposalId":"ID of the proposal"},"returns":{"againstVotes":"Total votes against","description":"Description of the proposal","domain":"Domain category of the proposal","executed":"Whether the proposal has been executed","forVotes":"Total votes in favor","proposer":"Address of the proposer","votingEnds":"End time of voting period"}},"getRoleAdmin(bytes32)":{"details":"Returns the admin role that controls `role`. See {grantRole} and {revokeRole}. To change a role's admin, use {_setRoleAdmin}."},"grantRole(bytes32,address)":{"details":"Grants `role` to `account`. If `account` had not been already granted `role`, emits a {RoleGranted} event. Requirements: - the caller must have ``role``'s admin role. May emit a {RoleGranted} event."},"hasRole(bytes32,address)":{"details":"Returns `true` if `account` has been granted `role`."},"renounceRole(bytes32,address)":{"details":"Revokes `role` from the calling account. Roles are often managed via {grantRole} and {revokeRole}: this function's purpose is to provide a mechanism for accounts to lose their privileges if they are compromised (such as when a trusted device is misplaced). If the calling account had been revoked `role`, emits a {RoleRevoked} event. Requirements: - the caller must be `account`. May emit a {RoleRevoked} event."},"revokeRole(bytes32,address)":{"details":"Revokes `role` from `account`. If `account` had been granted `role`, emits a {RoleRevoked} event. Requirements: - the caller must have ``role``'s admin role. May emit a {RoleRevoked} event."},"supportsInterface(bytes4)":{"details":"See {IERC165-supportsInterface}."},"updateDomainReputation(address,uint8,uint256)":{"details":"Can only be called by admin role","params":{"amount":"New reputation amount","domain":"Domain to update reputation for","user":"Address of the user"}}},"title":"XAO Governance Contract","version":1},"userdoc":{"events":{"ProposalCreated(uint256,address,uint8)":{"notice":"Emitted when a new proposal is created"},"ProposalExecuted(uint256)":{"notice":"Emitted when a proposal is executed"},"ReputationUpdated(address,uint8,uint256)":{"notice":"Emitted when a user's reputation in a domain is updated"},"VoteCast(uint256,address,bool,uint256)":{"notice":"Emitted when a vote is cast on a proposal"}},"kind":"user","methods":{"ADMIN_ROLE()":{"notice":"Role definitions for access control"},"DOMAIN_BONUS_MULTIPLIER()":{"notice":"Multiplier for domain expertise in voting power"},"MIN_PROPOSAL_STAKE()":{"notice":"Minimum stake required to create a proposal"},"VOTING_PERIOD()":{"notice":"Duration of the voting period"},"castVote(uint256,bool)":{"notice":"Casts a vote on a proposal"},"constructor":{"notice":"Initializes the governance contract"},"createProposal(string,uint8)":{"notice":"Creates a new proposal"},"domainReputation(address,uint8)":{"notice":"Mapping of user addresses to their domain-specific reputation"},"executeProposal(uint256)":{"notice":"Executes a successful proposal"},"getProposal(uint256)":{"notice":"Retrieves details of a specific proposal"},"proposalCount()":{"notice":"Total number of proposals created"},"proposals(uint256)":{"notice":"Mapping of proposal IDs to proposal details"},"updateDomainReputation(address,uint8,uint256)":{"notice":"Updates a user's reputation in a specific domain"},"xaoStaking()":{"notice":"The XAO staking contract reference"},"xaoToken()":{"notice":"The XAO token contract reference"}},"notice":"This contract manages the decentralized governance of the XAO documentation.text: @notice The XAO token contract reference
@notice The XAO staking contract reference
@notice Role definitions for access control
@notice Duration of the voting period
@notice Minimum stake required to create a proposal
@notice Multiplier for domain expertise in voting power
@notice Total number of proposals created
@notice Mapping of proposal IDs to proposal details
@notice Mapping of user addresses to their domain-specific reputation
@notice Emitted when a new proposal is created
@notice Emitted when a vote is cast on a proposal
@notice Emitted when a proposal is executed
@notice Emitted when a user's reputation in a domain is updated

devdoc.author: XAO Protocol Team
devdoc.details: Implements role-based access control and proposal management with domain-specific voting

RoleAdminChanged(bytes32,bytes32,bytes32.details: Emitted when `newAdminRole` is set as ``role``'s admin role, replacing `previousAdminRole` `DEFAULT_ADMIN_ROLE` is the starting admin for all roles, despite {RoleAdminChanged} not being emitted signaling this. _Available since v3.1._

RoleGranted(bytes32,address,address).details: Emitted when `account` is granted `role`. `sender` is the account that originated the contract call, an admin role bearer except when using {AccessControl-_setupRole}.

RoleRevoked(bytes32,address,address).details: Emitted when `account` is revoked `role`. `sender` is the account that originated the contract call:   - if using `revokeRole`, it is the admin role bearer   - if using `renounceRole`, it is the role bearer (i.e. `account`)

castVote(uint256,bool).details: Takes into account user's voting power and domain expertise

params.support: Whether the vote is in favor or against

constructor.details: Sets up initial roles and connects to XAO token and staking contracts

params._xaoStaking: Address of the XAO staking contract
params._xaoToken: Address of the XAO token contract

createProposal(string,uint8).details: Requires proposer to have sufficient stake and appropriate role

executeProposal(uint256).details: Can only be called by executor role after voting period ends

params.proposalId: ID of the proposal to execute

returns.executed: Whether the proposal has been executed

getRoleAdmin(bytes32).details: Returns the admin role that controls `role`. See {grantRole} and {revokeRole}. To change a role's admin, use {_setRoleAdmin}.

grantRole(bytes32,address).details: Grants `role` to `account`. If `account` had not been already granted `role`, emits a {RoleGranted} event. Requirements: - the caller must have ``role``'s admin role. May emit a {RoleGranted} event.

renounceRole(bytes32,address).details: Revokes `role` from the calling account. Roles are often managed via {grantRole} and {revokeRole}: this function's purpose is to provide a mechanism for accounts to lose their privileges if they are compromised (such as when a trusted device is misplaced). If the calling account had been revoked `role`, emits a {RoleRevoked} event. Requirements: - the caller must be `account`. May emit a {RoleRevoked} event.

revokeRole(bytes32,address).details: Revokes `role` from `account`. If `account` had been granted `role`, emits a {RoleRevoked} event. Requirements: - the caller must have ``role``'s admin role. May emit a {RoleRevoked} event.

updateDomainReputation(address,uint8,uin.details: Can only be called by admin role

devdoc.title: XAO Governance Contract

ProposalCreated(uint256,address,uint8).notice: Emitted when a new proposal is created

ProposalExecuted(uint256).notice: Emitted when a proposal is executed

ReputationUpdated(address,uint8,uint256).notice: Emitted when a user's reputation in a domain is updated

VoteCast(uint256,address,bool,uint256).notice: Emitted when a vote is cast on a proposal

DOMAIN_BONUS_MULTIPLIER().notice: Multiplier for domain expertise in voting power

MIN_PROPOSAL_STAKE().notice: Minimum stake required to create a proposal

castVote(uint256,bool).notice: Casts a vote on a proposal

domainReputation(address,uint8).notice: Mapping of user addresses to their domain-specific reputation

getProposal(uint256).notice: Retrieves details of a specific proposal

proposals(uint256).notice: Mapping of proposal IDs to proposal details

updateDomainReputation(address,uint8,uin.notice: Updates a user's reputation in a specific domain

userdoc.notice: This contract manages the decentralized governance of the XAO protocol
